website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for those looking for a quality rod holder that they can use without having to drill holes in their boat.
pros: Designed for use with boats and kayaks
Can be used on piers, bridges, and other places that can hold a clamp
cons: Some buyers point to quality issues (particularly the plastic base), as well as the fact that this holder can be difficult to mount to some boats or surfaces

customer_reviews.title: These boat holders worked great in our kayak.
customer_reviews.text: They seem like quality products and I like the way they are designed. The ability to adjust the setup and different angels and attach in different ways is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: andr

customer_reviews.title: No holds barred
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution if you don’t want to drill in to your kayak. I can also move it’s position or move to another kayak. The holder is well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: BT_hoagie

customer_reviews.title: Strong Hold
customer_reviews.text: This boat rod holder is very sturdy and does exactly what it’s supposed to do. It can be attached to a boat for some simple trolling however, you can also rig it to hold onto a railing while, for example, at the pier. The holder is made of thick, tough plastic and can be set at different angles and locked in place using a knob to tighten everything.
customer_reviews.author: Belle's Book Labyrinth

customer_reviews.title: Super well made.
customer_reviews.text: This Fishing rod holder is awsome, Super adjustable and sturdy grips very well to anything basically, not just boat. Highly recommend this product. Btw in the picture I paired it up with their amazing fishing rod that I also recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lui

customer_reviews.title: A better tilt down lock would make this a perfect 5 star item.  I made my own tilt lock.
customer_reviews.text: Really want some rod holders on our Jon boat. I really like this 2 pack but you MUST modify the tilt down or you WILL lose rods and reels. I am bolting a scrap piece of metal to make a tilt stop so the rod will not tilt down past horizontal. A simple change in the design of the molding would make this a 5 star plus item. I knew I would have to do something from the other reviews. I will still order another 2 and make tilt locks for those too. Will try and add pictures on the boat as I get them.
customer_reviews.author: DavidJ

customer_reviews.title: What a great deal on very nice rod holders
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised at the quality of these fishing rod holders. They seem sturdy and made well enough. My husband put on the boat as soon as we received them.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: They work great.
customer_reviews.text: They seem study and can install a variety of fishing rods on it,made well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Marinucci

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. I'll definitely be using when I go out in the boat. Mounts to the side of the aluminum Jon Boat perfectly. I'm also going to use it any time I fish from a dock or pier. Clamps down tight to anything that fits in it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheap Angler Fishing

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice fishing rod holder and well made and sturdy.Great for installation on your boat or dock.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Toensing

customer_reviews.title: This will not fit every dock, boat or table
customer_reviews.text: I like that you can mount it on park benches some places on the dock but you can't mount it everywhere also screwing the hinges and tighten it on the surfaces can be kind of frustrating I suggest you buy some kind of lubricant make it easier. also depending on the size of your fishing rod handle it may not fit the rod holder at all in order to get mines into it I had to open up as far as it can go and then force my rod into it. overall it's a decent product
customer_reviews.author: Terrill

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install many different positions sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it on the boat yet, but I can say it is very sturdy and easy to install. I tried it on my porch railing to see the ease of installing. I love all the different positions I can use. I can't wait to get out on the boat again. Hopefully next month. But it is extremely easy to figure out. I love how it easily attached to my porch held my pole and moved when I positioned it into different positions
customer_reviews.author: anna parks

customer_reviews.title: Solid, substantial and well engineered.
customer_reviews.text: I clamped the unit to the transom for trolling at the lake. The trigger release rod clamp operated very well and the angle adjustment screw was perfect! Very sturdy and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey H

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great when you got 2 extra buddies who want on the boat
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: This rod holder is awesome👍
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed the the rod holders. From the looks of it it looks awesome and they works awesome I give it a thumbs up👍. Here are some pictures.
customer_reviews.author: alexy velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Fishing tools
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift from my father. I really like that it's very light weight yet heavy duty. This product is very well made as well as multi functional. Very nicely thought-out case and design.
customer_reviews.author: JOANN

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for trolling...
customer_reviews.text: These are probably sufficient for somebody that is using them in a stationary manner, or maybe in a kayak or rowboat. These are definitely not meant for trolling on a boat with a gas powered motor! I can not get the rod locks to stay closed. The vibration from the engine alone causes them to open completely. I do not trust these to hold my gear securely. I would also recommend backing the mounting foot up with a board to allow for better purchase and stability. It is possible I have received two lemons, but I can not recommend these for trolling, which was the entire reason I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Fisher 2

customer_reviews.title: These do not live up to the reviews
customer_reviews.text: I have been a mechanical engineer for 20 years and these are not well built. They are built from the cheapest of materials. The molds were also the cheapest molds possible. Everything is sharp no rounded edges on the plastic parts. From a function standpoint I could not get them tight enough to securely hold a rod sufficient enough to not loose the rod overboard upon hooking a fish. The rubber feet broke off on the first use, and were not intended to pivot which is necessary to fit on basically any boat that does not have perfectly vertical sides, which is probably most boats. Keep shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well but DO NOT overtighten!!
customer_reviews.text: My first ever pole holder. I guess I like these pretty well. I like it that I can move them around. I don’t like having to turn my spinning reel upside while in the holder though, but maybe that’s just the way it is? What I don’t like is that if you overtighten them, the clamp bolt will immediately unscrew itself from the rubber end thus making it something you have to pay attn to moving forward. I’m. It sure what the fix is. Glue maybe? Mine came with no instructions or warnings not to overtighten.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Sheroan

customer_reviews.title: Easy and durable,
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice rod holders. and they can be mounted nicely on my boat. they are also super easy to install and use. I am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Versitile Rod Holders!
customer_reviews.text: Very good holders for the value. They are very flexible and have 3 different tightening mechanisms. Worked great for my Jon boat!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: The best fishing rod holder for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I used these to try into my rail system. You can just add a T bolt and attach to many of the popular Kayak or Boat track systems. Check out the video for a how too. More info on clickbait fishing on youtube.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn H.

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe the quality that you get for the price here. Less than 7bucks! This for holders is a beast. Honestly not sure how they can sell it at this price and make money. I would expect to see a $30 price tag at a big box outfitter. Lakes are iced over here so it won't go on a boat until spring but I did connect to a rack in my garage and play around with it a little. Big fan of the functionality here. Quick release on the holder is easy to use and quick. Excited about this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great rod holder!
customer_reviews.text: Great rod holder. Sturdy, well made, does the job very well! I use it on a small 12 feet boat for lake fishing.
customer_reviews.author: lay opinion

customer_reviews.title: Lost a $200 combo thanks to this
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a fishing trip. These are a terrible design and no matter how hard you tighten them down, they simply tip over . This cost me a $200 rod and reel and will be getting returned immediately. The other designed ones work significantly better.
customer_reviews.author: stuhall27

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine so far
customer_reviews.text: Used one time on a 14.5 Lund alluminum boat. They don't seem real strong but they worked with 3-4' waves and large dipsey divers so they get my thumbs up. I was little concerned about them breaking and losing a rod but that didn't happen. Hopefully they will hold up. They did not work on my hobie kayak due to the shape of the side rails. I doubt that any clamp-on style would work.
customer_reviews.author: robert waugaman

customer_reviews.title: These worked great in our kayak.
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to install and work for spinning rod/reel or fishing gear. They hold a rod and reel very securely. Better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great rod holder! Must have for fishing with kids!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great rod holder!! If you have kids this is a must have. It’s locking ability prevents a fish from pulling the rod into the water. A quick release feature allows for quick access when you get a fish. Stores easily and easily connects to a boat or dock. I’ll be purchasing another!!
customer_reviews.author: Brayden

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE! THE CLAMPS PICTURED ARE NOT WHAT YOU GET!
customer_reviews.text: I don't actually know if the product is good or not, since it's not what I actually wanted and am sending it back. BEWARE! What's pictured here is not what you get. (Me anyway...) Mine came with different clamps that won't fit my boat. (The clamps you see in the 'customer images' section are what I got, not what I wanted. .) I specifically wanted the clamp on these in the Amazon picture. Not what I got.
customer_reviews.author: srcharlz

customer_reviews.title: Solid and well crafted!
customer_reviews.text: Very solid rod holder with multiple mounting options. The ribbed gear holds firm so you wind have to worry about a fish or a log snag stealing your pole. All in all this is a great option for anyone who doesn’t want to make a permanent modification to their kayak!
customer_reviews.author: Casey S.

customer_reviews.title: Well made, great price
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the versatility of this rod holder. And very sturdy. The only improvement would be if the bolt were stainless. I worry about rust, I think spraying the threads with silicone spray may be a good way to avoid rust.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J. Ford 12/14/54

customer_reviews.title: Great for kayak and docks
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to install in our kayak or on the dock. They are very sturdy and easy to set up. This is a great addition to my fishing gear.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Kellner

customer_reviews.title: Must Have For Any Canoe Fishing Trip
customer_reviews.text: Easily install these on a canoe and troll behind. We used these for a Canada Fishing trip for lake trout and worked like magic. Will be purchasing more as we had multiple canoes.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca finley

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t tighten enough...
customer_reviews.text: The tightener that prevents the rod holder from pivoting doesn’t tighten enough to prevent the holder from turning. We were trolling and bites from 1-2 lbs fish would cause the rod holder to swing back toward the fish. The rod would end up pointing straight back at the fish allowing the rod to almost get pulled right out of the rod holder.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Withstands Trolling Pull With No Issues
customer_reviews.text: Really surprised at how this thing holds up. 4 trips so far and it is the only version of the 3 I bought that can handle trolling. The other two brands I have just bend off. I have a 2015 Tracker PT 175 TF and I have one on each side of the Transom.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.text: I mounted it to my kayak and it keeps my fishing pole out of the way and in any position. And it can be adjusted easily.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great solid rod holder with many applications
customer_reviews.text: This product is very solid overall. Construction is sturdy and well thought out. It is easy to adjust the angle of the rod holder to fit many different applications. I use it primarily on my kayak to hold an extra fishing rod. I also plan to test it on my John boat this coming spring / summer. I suspect it will also work well to hold a dip net or landing net if needed. I was able to paddle my kayak with a rod in the holder without issues. Pictures are from test fitting before I took the kayak out. Overall, very pleased and will definitely purchase again if they work as well on my John boat as the kayak.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install & use.
customer_reviews.text: 1st. time I used one I pulled my rod out & the rod holder came out also & fell into the river. They do not lock in. The holders do not lock down in place tight enough to hold the rod if a large fish hits the line.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Nagle

customer_reviews.title: Great rod holder which can easily be attached!
customer_reviews.text: So first thing’s first. I love how easy it is to move from place to place, it’s an easy detach as well as attaching it. It’s made out of durable material which means that it won’t rust quickly and will last for some time. It is very sturdy and hard for it to swivel in its position. Overall great device!
customer_reviews.author: Berenice Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Poor in detail and I need to spent half hour ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor in detail and I need to spent half hour to sand down the sharp edges. The casting of the metal frame is somewhat primitive. Otherwise it would be great I have to change my review from 4 stars to 1 star after first use, it cannot clamp onto 2" rail as described, the rubber stopper keep on detaching from the spindle when attempt to lock onto the rail. Virtually useless, poor in design !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Hands Free Fishing
customer_reviews.text: Used this rod holder for trolling and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. The pivot has to be tightened down pretty good or it will turn. Other than that works well. Better than the stamped steel ones. I place a block of wood between the boat and the bracket as to not dig into the aluminum.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kaszowski

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product and arrived quickly. Going to do a you tube review video soon! Thank you Plusinno!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for thin rail on our pontoon boat!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted some rods holders for our pontoon boat but didn't want anything permanently mounted. Most products out there were too big for the thin railing but these work perfect! Sturdy and easy to tighten on the rail. Like that you can easily move then to different spots around the boat. Great quality, too, should last us a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome rod holders, It is for this to work well in the dock.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use it as a rod holder to free up my hands if I need to grab the net or something. Very sturdy, was very easy to install. Highly recommend. Make sure you use the locking mechanism, not sure my rod would stay in if otherwise. I use it for lake trout.
customer_reviews.author: Chef

customer_reviews.title: Fish on . . . Oh No!
customer_reviews.text: These rod holders are quick and easy to install, the wider clamp fit over the 1.5” gunnel on the boat and clamped securely. After using it one time I noticed that the rotational lock opened up as I was trolling, which could allow the rod to fall out if mounted horizontal or downward facing during a fish strike, I am concerned that losing a $250 fishing rod and reel with these holders. I upgraded to a more durable brand afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: kim bradbury

customer_reviews.title: Strudy
customer_reviews.text: Fits the pontoon perfectly and allows me to troll and still catch fish
customer_reviews.author: Bill R

customer_reviews.title: Works well but wish the threading made for quicker install
customer_reviews.text: Most situations I have used this has had a lip to go over, for instance the side of a boat, the high threading makes install and removal kind of a pain. Other then that these work great for holding the rods while trolling. Would be nice to have an attachment for shore fishing as well
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for a rowboat
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a small aluminum rowboat. Flexible position adjustment and clamps provide easy on and off. No need to install permanent rod holder brackets or drill hole in the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved these.they seems very durable.and we looking forward to installing on the boat in the coming fishing trip.
customer_reviews.author: John McAfee

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice rod holders and it's also great product for fishing by the lake. I will buy a few more.
customer_reviews.author: alejandra b.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job for catfishing and trolling. Secures easily to my 16’ aluminum v-hull Crestliner. Highly recommended if you’re looking for a no fuss rod holder.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan C Gerber

customer_reviews.title: SURPRISINGLY GOOD FOR LOW PRICE
customer_reviews.text: Holder was easy to install and use. We have used other clamp on rod holders, but were limited to available hand or cover rails. Leaving the back of the rod installed in the clamp took some getting used to as well, but the rod holder worked well. Excited to use it more as it warms up and the fish are biting more. Only change we plan on making is reducing the size of the clamping bolts since ours have to be backed out almost entirely to fit in the bulkhead.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca keller

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these fishing tools and installed them on my pelican kayak. Simple installation and perfect adjustability and great for kayaking.
customer_reviews.author: lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Strong Materia!!
customer_reviews.text: It seemed sturdy and made well enough when i received it. And it worked great in our kayak in my last outdoor fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Fishing Boat Rods Holder with Large Clamp Opening
customer_reviews.text: I put this item on an old 14' canoe. It actually fit's very well. Clamps tight and looks good. I like the option of being able to mount the rod holder section vertically or horizontally on the clamp. This give you two options depending on where you need to mount the clamp. I didn't give it 5 stars due not having time to actually take it fishing yet.
customer_reviews.author: CJC

customer_reviews.title: Works great and stays in a place
customer_reviews.text: This rod holder is great. It's easy to install and works for spinning rod/reel or fly fishing gear. I mounted it to my kayak and it keeps my fishing pole out of the way and in any position.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: Needed rod holders for my 1947 Larson Aluminum boat
customer_reviews.text: Easily mounted with the screw on feature and works great on my aluminum boat.
customer_reviews.author: North Fork Larry

customer_reviews.title: Use a tag line
customer_reviews.text: Easy mount but be sure and use a tag line to prevent it from coming off when trolling.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Installation is not comlicated,and it's very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This rod holder could not be more perfect for my canoe. I mount both on my canoes for variable access. I like that the rod holder can be removed from the base easily for tranportation We fish inland lakes and rivers.
customer_reviews.author: Akram K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and appear sturdy enough!!
customer_reviews.text: I am really surprised at the quality of the rod holders. They are easy to adjust to any directly, which are extremely useful for fishing on my kayak.
customer_reviews.author: jason pierce

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy rod holder.
customer_reviews.text: These rod holders were easy to install and were able to accommodate multiple types of locations. Very sturdy once a fish is on the hook. I used it trolling for bass. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: VJSingh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install!!
customer_reviews.text: The rod holders are exactly as the item advertised.They are mounted to the boat just fine and adjust easily.Work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: shisheen Harper

customer_reviews.title: the  T bolt is  too big to tighten down onto the boat.
customer_reviews.text: the T bolt is too big to tighten down on the boat making it real loose. Now we have to struggle with it to get it off. we will replace it with a carriage bolt and tighten it down with a ratchet. otherwise it looks like a good product.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my spare kayak which is a $100 hardware-store 8ft'er. Clamps right over the front ridge of the cockpit. works perfectly. Inexpensive way to kayak fish for an afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Doc1

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and lots of adjustment
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these hoping to use them on the side windows of my fiberglass boat. They just don't work for this application. I think they will work just fine on my aluminum jon boat though.
customer_reviews.author: wade daniels

customer_reviews.title: Easily adjustable and work just fine.
customer_reviews.text: These rod holders are excellent quality. They work greatly on my boat and hold the rods securely at any position you want.
customer_reviews.author: Elvis vigil

customer_reviews.title: Work greatly in our boat
customer_reviews.text: It's great to attach your fishing rod holder to your boat, which is easy to install. I really like these---stable and hold my rods at the angle I prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Asmaa Alobaidi

customer_reviews.title: Quality and tough
customer_reviews.text: This is great for kayak fishing. I have had lots of success with this rod holder. It has kept fish from escaping with my rod!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Boat Rod Holder!
customer_reviews.text: I have some on my boat and absolutely love them. I fish for everything and have never had one fail. Removing the rod is fast and easy which is very important when trolling. Works Great!!
customer_reviews.author: anton

customer_reviews.title: It Will Chew Up Your Handles Unless You Sand It First
customer_reviews.text: This rod holder will ruin your rod handles. The mold lines of the plastic are on the inside (poor design) where the sharp edges will tear into your cork handles. I spent 30 minutes with sandpaper making sure no sharp edges remained. Voila, the perfect most easy to use rod holder ever for a great price. If you want to spend the time sanding the rough edges it is 5 stars. If you don't, it's 1 star and will destroy your rod.
customer_reviews.author: Awesomelikebatman

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Product Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have had many other pole holders that Iv'e tried connecting to the picnic table, They have either not worked, broke, or just plain sucked! This one is perfect ! VERY durable, can use multiple ways, and holds pole sturdy !
customer_reviews.author: MarkJodi

customer_reviews.title: Knurl in metal not deep enough - rod holder spins easily by hand
customer_reviews.text: Product seemed sturdy, but the knurls in the metal part were not deep enough to stop the rod holder part from moving. I was able to move top by hand, even when tightened to the max.
customer_reviews.author: Ned B.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable rod holder
customer_reviews.text: My son ordered this rod holder to attach to an old surfboard. It’s been working well for him so far. I can’t speak to security features, but it was easy to install and is working well for him
customer_reviews.author: SD91932

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy construction.
customer_reviews.text: Good idea. Flimsy construction. No matter how much you tight the clamp it will newer be tight. PS $8 return label. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Rafal S

customer_reviews.title: Great product for any kind of fishing from boat
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product meets all requirments that I hag. Easy to operate, easy to install would recommend this product for any that is fishing off a boat.
customer_reviews.author: Tran

customer_reviews.title: Works  as i expected!
customer_reviews.text: It's strong and flexible. and it's easy to open release your pole when its fish on! Works as expected and easy to mount on my boat.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Great for kayaks and boats
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am very impressed with the quality and action of this product. It is very simple to use and also versatile. I look forward to using it on my next crappie fishing trip . I recommend this product to anyone who fishes from a boat or kayak.
customer_reviews.author: Jeramiah Pinion

customer_reviews.title: Nice fishing boat rod holder
customer_reviews.text: I was greatly surprised by the high quality of this holder. It worked well on my boat.
customer_reviews.author: adrian martin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Especially for the affordable price
customer_reviews.text: The product is great quality. My father said that he would be ordering a pair himself (and he knocks on everything lol)
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: very versitile
customer_reviews.text: This holder works great in all kinds of situation. Clamped it to picnic table as i set up my pole. Clamped it to the boat while fishing. Very ease to take pole in and out quickly. Seems very sturdy. Has rubber on the inside of the clamps so that whatever you clamp it to doesn't get scratched. Very happy with this pole holder. Oh and has a bag to carry it in!
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Great rod holders!
customer_reviews.text: These fishing rod holders mounted to the boat very securely. It was easy to slip the rod in the holder and it held it firmly. We will be buying a few more of these for the other side of the boat. Very handy when fishing with two or three poles at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Lenu

customer_reviews.title: Bought to use on a jonboat
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I have not used it due to sold my jonboat. However, I can say that it looks very sturdy and have no doubt it will work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Goran

customer_reviews.title: Quick release
customer_reviews.text: Used this in Canada fishing trip. Very stable . Easy to retrieve rod from holder.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not durable you will loose your rod
customer_reviews.text: Not durable at all . I had a light rod. I was catching pin fish and emit eventually pulled it off and fell in the water. Not happy with this
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my 14' aluminum skiff!
customer_reviews.text: Great holder for bait caster rod & reels. Not so much for an open face, but, it will hold it. 5 stars for the 2 holders!
customer_reviews.author: Vinnie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I can’t wait to get out in the water and use this! A sturdy construction and comes with a little carrying case
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Product appears to be solid and very well made. I have not used it yet and will file another report if needed. but its looking good....UPDATE!...BUY ONE..It works like a champ!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: I do YouTube videos as "Da Garbage Disposal" I am a professional eater that does bad actin' as well (very good at both)
customer_reviews.author: Da Garbage Disposal

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile purchase
customer_reviews.text: Use on one of my regular kayaks if a friend wants to fish with me. Easy to attach and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plastic on clamp is deteriorating
customer_reviews.text: After 4 times out with these rod holders I am starting to lose one of them already. The clamp that allows it to rotate horizontally is deteriorating quickly - no longer holding position and leaving lots of pulverized plastic around it.
customer_reviews.author: V. Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Quality on point
customer_reviews.text: I like how plusinno went out of their way to create something that was made from quality materials. It holds on pretty good on my boat just like any other more expensiver rod holder. I'd say why not give it a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow

customer_reviews.title: fit my lowe 17ft mod v perfect I was worried because the gunnels are really wide ...
customer_reviews.text: fit my lowe 17ft mod v perfect I was worried because the gunnels are really wide on the LOWE but they fit perfect and I love using them to troll for trout. they are a bit cheesy but have held up really well and I am happy with them plus I didnt have to drill any holes in my boat or install anything permanent which does not work for a boat that put a blind on for over half the year.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Strong material used, holds pole nicely to paddle boat.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice!
customer_reviews.text: The best investment for my boat! Have caught good sized fish while trolling and was surprised how durable they are! I have used them on a few different brand and style of boats!
customer_reviews.author: Cory Voss

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dime.
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy, made with quality materials. I use 4 of these on my boat and I love that I didnt need to drill a hole and I can move them as I please. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Faded fishing guru

customer_reviews.title: Fishing Rod Holders
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my husband for our pier fishing here in California. It's a little disappointing, the plastic is week and when you tighten them down it doesn't tighten all the way, and you still need to be careful that they don't come loose. Will need to add something to them so that they don't slip. Not sure if I feel comfortable putting good rods in them.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Functional!!!
customer_reviews.text: My rod fit in this holder great. It holds up really well. And It is easily clamped on and allows the rod to be adjusted both vertically and horizontally.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Nice rod holders, but the rubber bumpers fall off easy on the screw end.
customer_reviews.text: The rod holders are well made and easy to install, but you have to be careful with the rubber bumper on the screw end, they come off easy. I installed the screw side outside of my pontoon boat rail to keep from getting caught on the screw, but when I removed the holder the rubber bumper fell into the water. I emailed the seller for a replacement part but have not heard back.
customer_reviews.author: Robo

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Versatile!!
customer_reviews.text: These rod holder are just what I needed. they work very well and they can be clamped steadily to the boat. they hold the rod straightly and steadily and they fit different lenghts of rods quite well.
customer_reviews.author: david

product_meta.title: PLUSINNO Fishing Boat Rods Holder with Large Clamp Opening 360 Degree Adjustable Fishing Rod Racks Folding Holder
feature_bullets: 🎣【Clamp Max. Opening 1.97 Inch. 1Pack】- Include 1 Pcs Fishing Pole Boat Holders. Please kindly check your boat board size before buying.

🎣【Eco-friendly Material & Anti-Corrosion】- This fishing boat rod holder is totally made of high quality and eco-friendly material--strong & anti-corrosion, constructed with high impact resistant heavy duty ABS.
🎣【Universal Fit】- Accommodates Spinning, Casting and Spincast rod handles,360 degree adjustable，Rod Holder makes it easy to access your rod and put it into the perfect position.

🎣【High Impact Resistant Construction】- The construction is very easy to hold on the boat or kayaks which is very steady. Great fishing rod holders for boats or kayaks, includes stainless steel hardware.
🎣【Best Gifts Choice】: It's the best gift to send father, son, husband, fiancé, boyfriend for the upcoming Christmas.
